header.description: General language labels used in frontend and backend.

trans-unit.source: In addition, a link should be placed on the data protection page which calls the cookie popup again so that the user can adjust his settings. To do this, an "external URL" must be stored in the TYPO3-RTE, which e.g. calls the homepage with the following parameter "?showOptIn=1". Example URL: https://www.sgalinski.de/?showOptIn=1
All cookie related scripts needs to be added to the configuration and don't load them anywhere else!

The license key of this extension is invalid. Some functions like the important file generation are disabled. Please make sure that the key is inserted correctly, within the settings of "sg_cookie_optin", which is found in the backend module "Extensions".

The license key of this extension is invalid. Some functions like the important file generation are disabled. Please make sure that the key is inserted correctly, within the settings of "sg_cookie_optin", which is found in the "Extension Configuration" of the backend module "Settings".

The license key of this extension isn't set. Some functions like the important file generation are disabled. Please add a key, within the extension settings of "sg_cookie_optin", which is found in the backend module "Extensions".

The license key of this extension isn't set. Some functions like the important file generation are disabled. Please add a key, within the settings of "sg_cookie_optin", which is found in the "Extension Configuration" of the backend module "Settings".
This module serves for the management of cookies. There can be a maximum of one entry per site root, if nothing exists, add one with the help of the button below.
Please select one of the following website roots:
Please delete all the records in the list below, except one.
The following tool delivers information about used cookies on your site. Use this information for the cookie instruction in the configuration. Beware that not all cookies might be listed. URL
